Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition: Bike \Bike\, n. [Ethymol. unknown.] A nest of wild bees, wasps, or ants; a swarm. [Scot.] --Sir W. Scott. [1913 Webster] ||

bike n 1: a motor vehicle with two wheels and a strong frame [syn: {motorcycle}] 2: a wheeled vehicle that has two wheels and is moved by foot pedals [syn: {bicycle}, {wheel}, {cycle}] v : ride a bicycle [syn: {bicycle}, {cycle}, {pedal}, {wheel}]
